item.description: Barnes and Noble @ Lincoln Plaza will Host Greg Epstein for a book signing on Sunday, November 1st from 2:00 - 5:00 PM. There will be some books for sale at the signing. You can still purchase a copy through Amazon and help Greater Worcester Humanists at the same time. [url=http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0061670111?ie=UTF8&tag=greatworcehum-20&linkCode=as2&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=0061670111">Good Without God: What a Billion Nonreligious People Do Believe<img src="http://www.assoc-amaz... width="1" height="1" alt="" style="max-height : 700px ; max-width : 700px ; margin : 0px !important"></img>
item.name: "Good Without God" booksigning by Greg Epstein
